TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeysConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implements class System.Collections.IComparer
Public Class KeysConverter Inherits TypeConverter Implements IComparer
public ref class KeysConverter : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter, System::Collections::IComparer
type KeysConverter = class inherit TypeConverter interface IComparer

summary.span: 提供 ，將 物件與其他表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a to convert objects to and from other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多數情況下，型別轉換子用來轉換執行個體及其對應的當地語系化表示法。Most commonly, the type converter is used to convert instances to and from their corresponding localized representations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別進行轉換至。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to convert a to a . 此範例假設您擁有名為`TextBox1`上名為`Form1`。This example assumes that you have a named `TextBox1` on a named `Form1`. [!code-csharp[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWindowsFormsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SystemWindowsFormsKeys/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Generalized Type Conversion
How to: Implement a Type Converter

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是預設值，編譯器提供的建構函式類別。This is the default, compiler-supplied constructor for the class. 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a . 請改為呼叫方法的類別。Instead, call the method of class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.
